website_summaries.verdict: A solid glass grinder with a powerful motor that works for a beginner as well as a serious hobbyist.
pros: The strong, quiet and powerful motor allows you to work without the need to apply much pressure
It features a handy removable water reservoir, includes 2 diamond grinding bits, and comes with a 5-year warranty
cons: It is important to note that this model does not ship with any shielding, so all protective equipment must be purchased separately

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Grinder
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace a very old Glastar Grinder. The Inland Wiz Grinder is great. I have had if for a week and it is a grinding machine. Lots of torque: I don’t believe that you could bog it down. Easy set up and use. This little piece of equipment deserves six or seven stars. A mere five star rating is not sufficient in extolling just how good this little grinder is. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: love the size of the tray for this grinder, and the fact that the top tray comes completely off to clean. The one thing I did not expect was that the grinder bits it comes with will chip the glass as it grinds until it is worn down. Had to buy new fine grinder heads which work a ton better. I will still use the rough head for things like nuggets. In any case the price was affordable and I love having my own grinder.
customer_reviews.author: S. C. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great grinder

I have made six stained glass windows in the last four months. The Wiz is a work horse and doesn't disappoint. I wouldn't have any other grinder.

customer_reviews.title: The standard for a reason
customer_reviews.text: When my wife started stained glass work last year we shopped around and researched for a grinder. All roads led back to the Wiz, the de facto standard for grinders. We considered the Wizling, since we're just starting and didn't know how much it would get used, but we're convinced we made a good decision. We've had no issue with it so far. Though the workshop is outside, we do store it inside when not in use. It is extremely consistent, which makes the work easier and faster. That consistency also makes learning that much easier. It also the easiest to find accessories and grinding bits for.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Elder

customer_reviews.title: Powerful and just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: This grinder is easy to set up, and the customer service at Inland is excellent. It is a good size for working with and it is stable on the bench. The reservoir can be moved and cleaned separately. I had a minor quality assurance issue with a burr in the grinder head which was easily removed with a 7/16th drill bit and when I reported it as an issue, they sent me a second one immediately. I appreciate that kind of service.

customer_reviews.title: If you do stained glass you need this grinder.
customer_reviews.text: I have been doing stained glass for 15 years. Sad to say that I was still using the same grinder that I bought 15 years ago. I had to buy a new one when I could no loner get the grinder bit off. I did some research and found that this Inland Wiz had all the features I wanted/needed and more. It has so much power that I hardly have to put pressure on the grinder head. I love the aspect of the removable water reservoir. So much less mess and time needed to get started on a new project. If you do stained glass you need this Inland Wiz CG Grinder. A great product for a small price.

product_meta.title: Inland Wiz CG Stained Glass Grinder
product_meta.description: This grinder is more powerful than the Wizling! Product Information WizCG™ Glass Grinder: Stock no. 20030 (Contour-GT™) WizCG™ has more features for less money! Key Features: A powerful 30 oz.-in. torque motor that makes it the most powerful grinder in its class. The same stable body design and work surface size found on the Impulse™ and Aero™ grinders. You get over 13 more square inches of work area and the work surface is reversible! Can be used with the RetroFitKit™and converted to a disc grinder. Can be used with the BevelerKit™ and converted into a beveler. Lift off reservoir is easy to remove for quick cleaning. WizCG™ comes with a 3/4" and 1/4" grinding bits, 3/4" standard BitSert™ 3/4", and 2-way on/off switch. Accepts Inland's wire frame face shield support for use with our FaceShield™ or MagnaShield™. Many optional accessories and bits work on the WizCG™. Five Year Full Confidence Warranty Product Uses: The WizCG™ updates the PopTop™ Wiz™ for the 90's with a sleek body design, larger work surface and easy clean reservoir. WizCG™ has more features and accepts more accessories than other grinders for the same price. Easy to setup and use, the WizCG™ is a grinder that also can be a disc grinder or beveling machine. Its size and design make the WizCG™ big enough to handle most grinding needs. Product Specs: Stock no. 20030 Master Case Quantity: 1 Construction: Injection molded plastic. Size: 11" x 10" x 5.5" For even more product information, read the User Guide.
